column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
This property indicates the water flowmeter type.
column4: 0x30 : running water 0x31 : recycled water 0x32 : warm water 0x33 : other water

column3: This property indicates the owner of the meter in the form of owner classification.
column4: 0x30 : Not specified  0x31 : Public waterworks company 0x32 : Private sector company 0x33 : Individual

column2: Measured cumulative amount of flowing water
column3: This property indicates the cumulative amount (consumption) of flowing water using a 9-digit number.

column2: Unit for measured cumulative amounts of flowing water
column3: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) for the measured cumulative amount of flowing water and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of flowing water.

column2: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of flowing water
column3: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amounts (consumptions) of running water, which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

column2: Detection of abnormal value in metering data
column3: This property indicates whether the meter has detected an abnormal value in the metering data.
column4: Abnormal value detected: 0x41 No abnormal value detected: 0x42

column3: Provides security information  about the abnormal states detected by the meter in the form of security data that identifies the abnormal states by means of bit assignment.
This property indicates the ID number of the meter.
column4: The ID number is specified using ASCII code. (Initial value : “000000”)

column3: This property indicates the month and year in which the verification of the meter will expire.
column4: The month and year are specified using ASCII code. xxxx xx Year Month
